text: Black women don't have the same body image problems as white women. They are proud of their bodies.
author: Tyra Banks

text: It's so important to understand your good attendance ups your chances of graduating.
author: Tyra Banks

text: I love the confidence that makeup gives me.
author: Tyra Banks

text: You have what it takes to be a victorious, independent, fearless woman.
author: Tyra Banks

text: The runway symbolizes something in society that's very intimidating to women.
author: Tyra Banks

text: I went through an obsession with eyebrows. I used to paint my eyebrows really, really strong. I look back now, and some were a little bit strong.
author: Tyra Banks

text: Sometimes you gotta leave when you're on top.
author: Tyra Banks

text: A smart model is a good model.
author: Tyra Banks

text: I wish I was harder; I wish I didn't care so much about being the nice girl all the time because a lot of the time people can take kindness for weakness, so I wish I had a little bit more 'oomph' in me.
author: Tyra Banks

text: Black women have always been these vixens, these animalistic erotic women.
author: Tyra Banks

text: I enjoy doing fashion shows and transforming myself into different looks for photo shoots.
author: Tyra Banks

text: I’m frugal. I’ve always been this way. When I was young, my mom would give me my allowance, and I’d peel off a little each week and have some to spare.
author: Tyra Banks

text: Stop saying these negative things about yourself.
author: Tyra Banks

text: People bully because they want their power back. People bully because they feel powerless, and to get that power, you have to take it from somebody else. And you have to take it from the easy target.
author: Tyra Banks

text: Never dull your shine for somebody else.
author: Tyra Banks
